channel.title: Flipping a picture
channel.description:
Hello i am currently making my first client and i was wondering how you edit a picture in some way...
the way: Flip one side of a picture so the half is like upside down.....
Please help,
Thanks

item.title: Flipping a picture
item.dc:creator: @iamthebest456 iamthebest456
item.description:
@iamthebest456 wrote:

Done thanks guys.

(Client almost done! woot)

Read full topic

item.title: Flipping a picture
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

To do it using paint:

  1. Open MS Paint.
  2. Select the part of the image you want to flip with the Select tool.
  3. Click on the Image tab on the menu bar, and click on Flip/Rotate.
  4. Choose which way or how you want to flip the selected portion of your image.
  5. Hit OK, and save.

To do it with Java, I found a very handy tutorial on image manipulation:
http://www.javalobby.org/articles/ultimate-image/#9

Read full topic

item.title: Flipping a picture
item.dc:creator: @webbsta webbsta
item.description:
@webbsta wrote:

just open up the picture in paint, where the small size squares are around the end of the document in pain are exactly half way down and accross, to flip the right side of the picture vertically, just select the area u want to flip with ur mouse and then right click and select an option at the bottom. hope this helps.

Read full topic
